events.title: TiranaJS Meetup #1: Community Launch
events.description: Join us for the inaugural event of TiranaJS! We're launching Tirana's newest JavaScript community with an evening of networking, lightning talks, and exciting discussions about the future of web development in our city.

schedule.activity: Meet Undici: Your New HTTP Friend - Renato Selenica

speakers.name: Renato Selenica
speakers.topic: Meet Undici: Your New HTTP Friend

events.title: TiranaJS Meetup #2: Zero to Production with Cloudflare

location.name: Coolab
location.address: Rruga e Dibr√´s Nr.65, Tiran√´ 1015, Albania

events.description: Join us for TiranaJS Meetup #2! This month we're diving into production-ready serverless development with Cloudflare Workers. Mateo Kurti will walk us through a live demo and technical deep dive, followed by our monthly JavaScript ecosystem roundup.

schedule.activity: Zero to Production with Cloudflare Workers - A live demo and technical deep dive by Mateo Kurti
This Month in JavaScript - News, releases, and notable updates from the JS ecosystem

highlights: Live demo: Cloudflare Workers in production
Technical deep dive with Mateo Kurti

speakers.name: Mateo Kurti
speakers.topic: Zero to Production with Cloudflare Workers

events.title: TiranaJS Brunch: Beyond the Daily Rush
events.description: One more TiranaJS before the year ends. No technical talks, no tutorials. Join us for a relaxed brunch to look back on the year and catch up with the community. Our friends at Bliss will stop by to share some thoughts on dealing with work stressors.

schedule.activity: Welcome & Coffee ‚Äî arrive early for pastries and catch-ups
Beyond the Daily Rush ‚Äî reflection session with Arilda Dushaj from Bliss
Networking ‚Äî close out the year with relaxed conversations

highlights: Guided conversation on managing work stressors with Bliss
Plenty of space to unwind and reflect together

events.title: TiranaJS Meetup #4: The Old Way, Rethought
